**public**** class **Query {

  **private**** static ****final** ResultTransformer DEFAULT\_TRANSFORMER

    = DistinctRootEntityResultTransformer.INSTANCE;

  **private**** final** CriteriaMap criterias = new CriteriaMap(CRI\_INIT);

  **private**** final** ProjectionMap projections = new ProjectionMap(PRO\_INIT);

  **private**** final** Strategy strategy;

  **private**** final** ResultTransformer resultTransformer;

  **public** HibernateQueryContext(Criteria criteria, Strategy strategy,

    ResultTransformer transformer) {

    **this** .criterias.put(ROOT, criteria);

    **this** .strategy = strategy;

    **this** .resultTransformer

      = transformer == **null** ? DEFAULT\_TRANSFORMER : transformer;

  }

  **public** Criteria getCriteria(String... fields) {

    **return**** this**.criterias.get(compileLocation(fields));

  }

  **public** Criteria getCriteria(JoinType type, String... fields)

    **throws** DataAccessException {

    **String** location = compileLocation(fields);

    JoinType savedType = **this** .criterias.getType(location)

   

    **if** (savedType != **null** && savedType != type) {

      **throw**** new** DataAccessException();

    }

   

    **return**** this**.criterias.get(location, type);

  }

  **public** Projection getProjection(String location, String field,

    ProjectionType type) {

    **return**** this **.projections.get(** new** ProjectionId(location, field, type));

  }

  **public** List getResultsList() **throws** DataAccessException {

    **if** ( **this** .strategy != **null** ) {

      **this** .addFetching();

      **this** .addFiltration();

      **this** .addOrder( **false** );

    }

    **return**** this**.getRootCriteria()

      .setResultTransformer( **this** .resultTransformer).list();

  }

  **public**  List getResultsList(Class type)

    **throws** DataAccessException {

    **if** ( **this** .strategy != **null** ) {

      **this** .addFetching();

      **this** .addFiltration();

      **this** .addOrder( **false** );

    }

    **return**** this**.getRootCriteria()

      .setResultTransformer( **this** .resultTransformer).list();

  }

  **public** List getResultIdList() {

    **if** ( **this** .strategy != **null** ) {

      **this** .addFiltration();

      **this** .addOrder( **true** );

    }

    **this** .applyProjectionsToCriterias(Projections.projectionList()

      .add(ProjectionType.GROUP.build(ROOT, T.FIELD\_ID)));

    **return** getIdFromRaw( **this** .getRootCriteria().list());

  }

  **public** T getResult() **throws** DataAccessException {

    **if** ( **this** .strategy != **null** ) {

      **this** .addFetching();

      **this** .addFiltration();

      **this** .addOrder( **false** );

    }

    **return** (T) **this** .getRootCriteria().uniqueResult();

  }

  **public** Long getResultIdentifier() {

    **this** .addFiltration();

    **return** ( **Long** ) **this** .getRootCriteria().uniqueResult();

  }

  **private** void applyProjectionsToCriterias() {

    **this** .applyProjectionsToCriterias(Projections.projectionList());

  }

  **private** void applyProjectionsToCriterias(ProjectionList list) {

    **for** (Pair< **String** , Projection> entry : **this** .projections.values()) {

      list.add(entry.getRight(), entry.getLeft());

    }

    **this** .getRootCriteria().setProjection(list);

  }

  **private** void addFetching() {

    FetchStrategy fetchStrategy = **this** .strategy.getFetchStrategy();

    **if** (fetchStrategy == **null** ) {

      **return** ;

    }

    Criteria criteria = **this** .getRootCriteria();

    **for** (Fetch fetch : fetchStrategy.getFetchedFields()) {

      criteria.setFetchMode(fetch.getField(), FetchMode.JOIN);

    }

  }

  **private** void addFiltration() {

    FilterStrategy filterStrategy = **this** .strategy.getFilterStrategy();

    **if** (filterStrategy == **null** ) {

      **return** ;

    }

    **for** (Filtr filtr : filterStrategy.getFiltrFields()) {

**      this** .getCriteria(filtr.getLocation())

        .add(filtr.getType()

          .build(filtr.getField(), filtr.getArgument()));

    }

  }

  **private** void addOrder(boolean addProjections) {

    OrderStrategy orderStrategy = **this** .strategy.getOrderStrategy();

    **if** (orderStrategy == **null** ) {

      **return** ;

    }

    **for** (Order order : sortStrategy.getOrderFields()) {

      Criteria criteria;

      **String** field;

      **if** (addProjections) {

        criteria = **this** .getRootCriteria();

        field = **this** .addProjectionForOrder(order);

      } **else** {

        criteria = **this** .getCriteria(order.getLocation());

        field = order.getField();

      }

      criteria.addOrder(order.build(field));

    }

  }

  **private** String addProjectionForOrder(SortOrder order) {

    OrderType type = order.getType();

    **String** location = order.getLocation();

    **String** field = order.getField();

    **if** (type == OrderType.PLAIN) {

      **return** compileLocation(

        **this** .getCriteria(location).getAlias(), field);

    }

    ProjectionType projectionType = getProjectionTypeFromOrder(type);

    **this** .getProjection(location, field, projectionType);

    **return** getProjectionAlias(location, field, projectionType);

  }

}

## Приложение 12: Маппердля DTO

...

public class FetchableTransformer

  implements ResultTransformer {

private final Set results;

  **private**** final** String id;

  **private**** final** Constructor constructor;

  **public** FetchableTransformer(Class type, String id) { [...] }

  @Override

  **public** Object transformTuple(Object[] tuple, String[] aliases) {

    **int** idLocation = **this** .findAliasLocation(aliases);

    **this** .checkTypes(tuple);

    **for** (T row : **this** .results) {

      **if** (row.getId().equals(tuple[idLocation])) {

        row.fetch(tuple);

        **return** row;

      }

    }

    T instance = **this** .constructor.instance(tuple);

    **this** .results.add(instance);

    **return** instance;

  }

  @Override

  **public** List transformList(List collection) {

    **return**** new** ArrayList(this.results);

  }

  **private** Constructor getConstructor(Class type) {

    **for** ( **final**** Constructor** construct : type.getConstructors()) {

      **if** (construct.getAnnotation(MappingConstructor.class) != **null** ) {

        **return** ( **Constructor** ) construct;

      }

    }

    **throw**** new ****IllegalStateException** ();

  }

  **private** int findAliasLocation(String[] aliases) {

    **for** ( **int** i = 0; i < aliases.length; i++) {

      **if** ( **this** .idAlias.equalsIgnoreCase(aliases[i])) {

        **return** i;

      }

    }

    **throw**** new ****IllegalStateException** ();

  }

  **private** void checkTypes( **final** Object[] tuple) {

    **Class** [] type = **this** .constructor.getParameterTypes();

    **if** (tuple.length != type.length) {

      **throw**** new ****IllegalStateException** ();

    }

    **for** ( **int** i = 0; i < tuple.length; i++) {

      **if** (tuple[i] != **null** && ! tuple[i].getClass().equals(type[i])) {

        **throw**** new ****IllegalStateException** ();

      }

    }

  }

}
